parse.title: Road signs in Bosnia and Herzegovina

text.*:
This article does not cite any sources. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. (October 2015) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)
Wikimedia Commons has media related to Road signs in Bosnia and Herzegovina.

Bosnia and Herzegovina is a signatory of Vienna Convention on Road Signs and Signals. Therefore, road signs don't differ much from the rest of Europe. Ministry of Transportation of Bosnia and Herzegovina regulates them.

Contents

  • 1 Priority signs
  • 2 Warning signs
  • 3 Prohibitory signs
  • 4 Mandatory signs
  • 5 Special regulation signs
  • 6 Indication signs
  • 7 Border crossing signs
  • 8 Checkpoint signs
  • 9 References
